verses.1: Tu-in Moses le Israel upate in mite thu pia-in, “Tu ni-a kong gen uh thupiakna khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.
verses.2: Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitang ah pai dingin Jordan na kantan ni-un suangtumpite na phut ding uh a, buan tawh na zut ding uh hi.
verses.3: Na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi Topa in note tungah hong ciam mah bangin bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna leitang, Topa na Pasian un note hong piakna gamah a lut dingin na gal kah uh ciangin tua suangte tungah hih thute na gelh ding uh hi.
verses.4: Jordan na gal kah khit uh ciangin Ebal Mual tungah tu ni-a kong thupiakna uh tawh kizui-in hih suangte na phut ding uh a, buan tawh tua suangte na zut ding uh hi.
verses.5: Tua lai ah Topa na Pasian uh adingin suang kibawl biakna tau khat na bawl ding uh a, tuate tungah sik tawh a kibawl nazatte na liik kei ding uh hi.
verses.6: Topa na Pasian uh adingin a kiseek lo suangtumte tawh biakna tau na bawl ding uh a, tua biakna tau tungah Topa na Pasian uh adingin meihal biaknate na pia ding uh hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangin thunuam a biakna te na pia ding uh a, tua lai munah ne-in, Topa na Pasian uh mai ah na lungdam ding uh hi.
verses.8: Hih thute khempeuh tua suangte tungah a kitel takin na gelh ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin Moses le Levi siampite in Israel-te khempeuh tungah, “Israel-te aw, gamdai unla ngai un: Tu ni-in Topa noteʼ Pasianʼ mi na suak uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih ciangin Topa noteʼ Pasianʼ thu mangin, tu ni-a kong gen uh ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.11: Moses in tua ni mahin mite thuhilhin,
verses.12: “Jordan na gal kah khit uh ciangin mite thupha a pia dingin Gerizim Mual tungah a ding ding minamte: Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Josef le Benjamin ahi hi.
verses.13: Ebal Mual tungah hamsia a pia dingin a ding ding minamte: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan le Naftali ahi hi.
verses.14: Levi mite in awging lianpi tawh Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih bangin ci ding uh hi.
verses.15: “‘ Topa adingin a kihhuai ahi, khutsiam paʼ khut tawh a kibawl, a kiseek ahi a, a kisung ahi zongin milim bawlin, mun simtham ah a koih mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.16: “‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtak lo mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.17: “‘A veengpaʼ gisuang a bot khia mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.18: “‘Mittaw pa lam a lakkhial mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.19: “‘Peemta, pa nei lo le meigong numeite ading thutang a heikhiatsak mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.20: “‘Amah in a paʼ tungah maizumna tun ahih manin, a paʼ zi dang tawh a lum khawm mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.21: “‘Ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nulepa mawhna a bawl mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.22: “‘A nuʼ tanu, a paʼ tanu, ahih kei leh a sanggamnu tawh a lum khawm mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.23: “‘A sungnu tawh a lum khawm mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.24: “‘A veengpa a that sim mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.25: “‘Mawhna nei lopa thah nadingin sumgolh a la mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.26: “‘Hih thute zuihna tawh hih thu a kipsak lo mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
